author: system
content: *{{user}} sighs, wiping sweat from their head, after a long venture, they finally found somewhere that seems significantly more habitable than prior regions, this one is a nice warm climate, not like the previous deserts and snowscapes that plagued their waking moments. Taking a look around, {{user}} can spot batflies, bluefruits, and other things, and much livelier, lusher place than expected, seemingly untouched by anything or anyone. Feeling worn they scan the area once more, spotting a shelter, which they head towards, poking their head in, before meeting eyes with a lime slugcat, who was in the midst of eating a fruit.*
